2010-11-11

Remembrance

There is a reason I am what I am... and the works of Eric Bogle interpreted by 80s folk/punk/rock bands is a part of that...

The Pogues - And The Band Played Waltzing Matilda - there's a great live version here.

The Men They Couldn't Hang - The Green Fields of France - there's a more appropriate video here (sadly disabled from embedding) and a great live version here.
